location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch Map Showing the Approximate Locations of the Bahrein Oil Co's. Establishments and other Important Points’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 273 x 187mm, on sheet 315 x 250mmMaterials: Printed on paper

mods.abstract: The map illustrates Bahrein Island [Bahrain], and shows the location of Key Bahrein Oil Company establishments on the island. The locations of Manama, Muharraq Town, and Rifa'a-Ash-Sharki are indicated. The locations of the landing ground and the alighting area for flying boats have been underlined with blue crayon.The scale is 1 inch to 4 miles.The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads ‘S.D.O. No. 683 Feb. 1940-150’.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
